curam.util.cache
Class CacheManagerEjb

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.cache.CacheManagerEjb

public final class CacheManagerEjb
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides access to caching services available only inside the server container.

Method Detail

getTransactionLocalCacheGroup

public static CacheGroup getTransactionLocalCacheGroup()
This method returns the cache group for transaction local caches. Invoking this method twice in the context of different transactions will return different cache groups.

Returns:
the cache group for transaction local caches

createTransactionLocalCacheGroup

public static CacheGroup createTransactionLocalCacheGroup()
Use this method to create a transaction local cache group when you are already in a transaction local context. For instance, if you have an instance of class A that is already a transaction local and you need a transaction local cache, use this method to create one to be used by this instance of class A.

Returns:
a newly created transaction local cache group that must only be used in the thread local context of the caller

postInvalidationMessage

public static <K> void postInvalidationMessage(CacheInvalidationMessage<K> msg)
This method triggers a cache invalidation throughout the entire cluster. When modifying data that affects the content of a cache do not remove or update the cached element directly; instead invoke this method to post an invalidation message. After invoking this method, the cached object should not be accessed for the remainder of the transaction.

Type Parameters:
K - The type the key of the entry to be invalidated
Parameters:
msg - the cache invalidation message
